- Application of new buildings and construction work on new buildings (dwelling used as a principal residence by the owner of the dwelling); 
- Renovation and repairs : substantial works on housing used as principal residence and (i) constructed more than 10 years prior to the start of the works (ii) newly acquired, the works to be completed in the five years following the acquisition
